column4: mmm can anyone tell me why my firefox is closing all the time on its own?
im new to linux where do i put that command in? lol
you have installed a game...the right name for browser is chromium-browser
how youtell me to install a game for?
how do i take this game out now please?
btw for fix your firefox, try to disable all plugins and look if it crash too
tools > add ons and disable all plugins
E: Could not open lock file /var/lib/dpkg/lock - open (13: Permission denied)
E: Unable to lock the administration directory (/var/lib/dpkg/), are you root?
or by terminal launch firefox -safe-mode and use it for awhile
